name: Astrolight
description:
-Astrolight-

Help Astro find the spaceship pieces using your resizing lantern light

This is a game made by a solo developer (me) for MashUp Game Jam #1 in 72 hours.

Theme: Size Matters

Enjoy :)

-Controls-
  • A = Move left
  • D = Move right
  • Space = Jump
  • Left Click = Growth light
  • Right Click = Shrink light
  • R = Restart level

Made by João Moraes
